package chapter2.step1;

public class DecomposeFactor {

	public String decompose(int n) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int k=2;
        String result=n+"=";
		while(k <= n) {
		if(k == n) {
		result=result+n;
		break;}
		else if( n % k == 0) {
		result=result+k + "*";
		n = n / k; }
		else
		k++;
		}
		return result;
	}

}
